remarks: The lattice of subspaces is atomic, i.e. any nonzero element is greater than or equal to some atom.  ( ~ shatomici analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-2015.)
statement:
lssatomic.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lssatomic.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lssatomic.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` W ) $.
lssatomic.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
lssatomic.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. S ) $.
lssatomic.n $e |- ( ph -> U =/= { .0. } ) $.
lssatomic $p |- ( ph -> E. q e. A q C_ U ) $.
$d A q $.
$d U q $.
$d W q $.
